body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Plants     Trees                Trees               Pinyon Pine (Pinus edulis)  Other Names: Pinyon (or Piñon), Two-leaf Pinyon, Two-needle Pinyon, Colorado Pinyon              Utah Juniper (Juniperus osteosperma)              Rio Grande Cottonwood (Populus deltoides)  Other Names: Fremont's cottonwood, meseta cottonwood              Single-Leaf Ash (Fraxinus anomala)  Other Names: dwarf ash
title: Colorado National Monument: Trees
